compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.1+ allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter compatibility requirements.

key_requirements: Ensure that recipients of the library receive the same rights you received.
Provide complete object files for relinking if you link other code with the library.
Make sure to inform recipients of their rights under the LGPL.
license.name: LGPL-2.1+
obligations: Distribute copies of the library with the same rights granted to you.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the library.
Include a copy of the LGPL license with the distributed library.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
